response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I understand its true worth to be $10,000. However, considering my commitment to making this opportunity accessible, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the chance to acquire this product for $9,500. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value while allowing me to maximize the return on this high-quality asset. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to collaborate.", "product_price": 9500}
